attributes.action: sack Steve McClaren and appoint Sam Allardyce as England manager
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bring pressure upon the F.A. to immediately replace Steve McClaren with Sam Allardyce as England manager before we get into more trouble than a barrel full of monkey's dizzy on cider.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
